    • createHotel

      public boolean createHotel(String hotelName, int stdRooms, int dlxRoom, int exeRooms)
      createHotel methods adds a new Hotel object to the list of hotels.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - - a String that holds the user input's hotel name.
      stdRooms - - holds the total number of standard room(s) to be created
      dlxRoom - - holds the total number of deluxe room(s) to be created
      exeRooms - - holds the total number of executive room(s) to be created
      Returns:
      true if the creation of the hotel was successful. Otherwise, false.

    • isTotalRoomValid

      public boolean isTotalRoomValid(int stdRooms, int dlxRoom, int exeRooms)
      isTotalRoomValid method checks if the total number of rooms is at least 1 or at most 50.
      Parameters:
      stdRooms - - holds the total number of standard room(s) to be created
      dlxRoom - - holds the total number of deluxe room(s) to be created
      exeRooms - - holds the total number of executive room(s) to be created
      Returns:
      true if it at least 1 or at most 50. Otherwise, false.

      checkIn - - an integer that holds the check-in date of a reservation.

      Parameters:
      name - - a String that holds tha guest's name
      room - - an integer value that holds the room number to be reserved
      checkIn - - an integer value that holds the check-in date for the reservation
      checkOut - - an integer value that holds the check-out date for the reservation
      price - - a double value that holds the reservation's price with no discount applied yet
      roomType - - a String value that holds the desired room type
      Returns:
      the reservation info

    • updateBasePrice

      public String updateBasePrice(int hotelIndex, double basePrice)
      updateBasePrice method updates the base price of a hotel, which is at first, 1299.0.
      Parameters:
      hotelIndex - - an integer that holds the index of the hotel the user wants to change the base price.
      basePrice - - a double that holds the new base price of the hotel, which must be more than 100.
      Returns:
      a string that holds a message whether the change was successful or not.

      dayToModify - - an integer that holds the day the user wants to modify.

      Returns:

      roomNum - - an integer value that holds the index of room of the hotel
      roomType - - a String that holds the room type

    • bookingSimulation

      public String bookingSimulation(int hotelToBook, String guestName, String roomType, int roomNum, int checkIn, int checkOut, String discountCode)
      bookingSimulation method simulates the process of making a reservation with or without discounts.
      Parameters:
      guestName - - a string that holds the guest name of a reservation.
      roomType - - a string that holds the room type the user desires to book.
      roomNum - - an integer that holds the room number of a reservation.
      checkIn - - an integer that holds the check-in date of a reservation.
      checkOut - - an integer that holds the check-out date of a reservation.
      discountCode - - a string that holds the code to get a specific discount.
      Returns:
      a string that holds a message whether the change was successful or not.
